mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ORDER_DETAIL (ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_PRICE, QUANTITY, DISCOUNT_RATE) SELECT #{orderId}, p.PRODUCT_ID, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, #{quantity}, p.PRODUCT_DISCOUNT_RATE FROM TBL_PRODUCT p WHERE p.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ORDER_DETAIL od JOIN TBL_REVIEW r ON od.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = r.ORDER_DETAIL_ID SET od.REVIEW_STATUS = 'N' WHERE r.REVIEW_ID = #{reviewId}
mapper.select: SELECT o.ORDER_ID, o.MEMBER_ID, o.ORDER_DATE, o.TOTAL_AMOUNT, o.PRODUCT_AMOUNT, o.DELIVERY_AMOUNT, o.POSTAL_CODE, o.ADDRESS, o.ADDRESS_DETAIL, o.RECEIVER, o.PHONE, o.REQUEST, o.ORDER_STATUS, od.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, od.PRODUCT_ID, od.PRODUCT_PRICE, od.QUANTITY, od.DISCOUNT_RATE, od.TRACKING_NUMBER, od.PARCEL_COMPANY, od.REVIEW_STATUS_YN FROM TBL_ORDER o INNER JOIN TBL_ORDER_DETAIL od ON o.ORDER_ID = od.ORDER_ID WHERE od.ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId}
